Description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain, which must be SV.

Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all
applications or submissions involving the product.

Clinical encounter number. (Decimal numbering may be useful for inserting
unplanned visits.) Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.

Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter or description of unplanned
visit. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY as a text
description of the clinical encounter.

Planned study day of the start of the visit based upon RFSTDTC in
Demographics.
Start date/time for a subject's visit, represented in ISO 8601 character format.
End date/time of a subject's visit, represented in ISO 8601 character format.

Variable Label:
Study Day of Start
of Visit
Description: Study day of start of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

Variable Label:
Study Day of End
of Visit
Description: Study day of end of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

Description of what happened to the subject during an unplanned visit. Null for
protocol-defined visits.
